home_description: ShopWise helps you track your grocery spending, discover saving patterns, and build smart shopping lists with the power of AI.
powerful_features_description: Everything you need to take control of your finances.
feature_visual_insights_description: Track your spending with intuitive charts and graphs. Understand where your money is going.
feature_camera_register_description: Simply scan your receipt's QR code and let our AI extract all the information for you.
feature_smart_lists_description: Create shopping lists and get AI-powered suggestions for items you might be missing.
feature_full_control_description: Manage your family's data, set preferences, and have a complete view of your shopping history.
login_description: Enter your credentials to access your account.
signup_description: Join ShopWise and start saving today!
logout_confirm_title: Are you sure you want to log out?
logout_confirm_desc: You will be returned to the homepage.
dashboard_potential_savings_desc: AI insights on savings coming soon!
dashboard_consumption_overview_desc: Your spending behavior over the last 12 months.
dashboard_top_expenses_desc: The products that have the biggest impact on your budget this month.
coming_soon_history_desc: This feature is under development and will be available soon.
purchase_history_description: View and filter all your past purchases.
empty_state_no_history_desc: Try adjusting your filters or add a new purchase to get started.
empty_state_no_recommendations_desc: As you add more purchases, our AI will generate personalized recommendations for you here.
shopping_list_description: Manage your active shopping list. Add, remove, and check off items.
suggestions_based_on_history: Based on your purchase history, you might also need:
error_getting_suggestions_desc: There was a problem contacting the AI. Please try again later.
add_purchase_description: You can import a purchase from a PDF receipt or enter the details manually.
settings_description: Manage your account, preferences, and privacy settings.
privacy_delete_data_desc: Permanently delete all your purchase history and related data.
privacy_delete_data_note: This action is irreversible. All your shopping lists, purchase history, and insights will be permanently erased. This cannot be undone.
privacy_delete_data_confirm_desc: This will permanently delete all your data.
privacy_delete_account_note: This action is irreversible. Your account, profile, and all associated data will be permanently erased. This cannot be undone.
privacy_delete_account_confirm_desc: This will permanently delete your entire account.
toast_error_generic: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
delete_confirmation_code_prompt: To confirm, please type the code <1>{{code}}</1> in the box below.
preferences_form_description: Customize the application's appearance and behavior.
preferences_form_error_not_logged_in: You must be logged in to save preferences.
preferences_form_family_size_desc: Help our AI provide better suggestions by telling us about your family.
profile_form_email_note: Your email address cannot be changed.
profile_form_linked_accounts_desc: Connect other accounts for faster login.
empty_state_no_chart_desc: Start adding purchases to see your spending analysis.
empty_state_no_expenses_desc: Add a new purchase to see your top expenses here.
modal_total_spent_desc: A breakdown of your total spending for the current month, distributed by each store.
modal_items_bought_desc: A list of the most recent items you've bought in the current month.
modal_main_category_desc: A detailed view of how your spending is distributed across different product categories this month.
modal_potential_savings_desc: Our AI analyzes your purchases to find potential savings. This feature is coming soon!
empty_state_no_modal_data_desc: There is no data available for the selected insight. Start adding purchases to see your data here.
modal_analysis_loading: Our AI is analyzing your data... this may take a moment.
premium_feature_desc_consumption: Unlock detailed consumption analysis and personalized insights by upgrading to our Premium plan.
family_settings_description: Manage your family composition, preferred establishments, and your plan.
plan_form_description: Choose the plan that best suits your needs.
plan_form_free_desc: For individuals and small families getting started.
plan_form_premium_desc: For those who want advanced insights and AI-powered features.
admin_dashboard_content: Welcome to the admin panel. Here you can manage users, view reports, and configure the system.
admin_users_description: View and manage all registered users.
admin_users_content: User management interface will be here.
admin_reports_description: Generate and view system usage reports.
admin_reports_content: Reporting tools will be available here.
admin_market_insights_description: Analyze market trends based on aggregated user data.
admin_market_insights_content: Market analysis tools will be here.
admin_settings_content: Global configuration options will be here.
admin_notifications_content: Notification management tools will be here.
admin_audit_content: Auditing and testing tools will be here.
market_form_add_new_desc: Add a new store, market, or fair to your list of preferred places.
market_form_address_placeholder: e.g., Rua das Flores, 123, São Paulo
market_form_favorites_desc: These are the stores you shop at most frequently. We will use them to generate personalized insights.
market_form_ignored_desc: We will not use data from these stores to generate price comparison insights.
market_form_toast_moved_ignored_desc: {{marketName}} will now be ignored in price comparisons.
market_form_toast_removed_desc: The establishment has been removed from your lists.
error_not_logged_in: You must be logged in to perform this action.
error_saving_purchase: There was an error saving your purchase. Please try again.
import_from_pdf_desc: Select a PDF of your electronic receipt (NFC-e) to automatically extract the purchase data.
scan_success_desc_pdf: PDF data extracted successfully. Please review the items below before saving.
scan_error_desc_pdf_detailed: We couldn't extract data from the PDF. Please ensure it's a valid electronic receipt (NFC-e) and try again. If the error persists, you can enter the data manually.
edit_item_description: Make corrections to the extracted item details here.
